product_description: Introduction: The motherboard diagnostic card is also called a POST card (Power On Self Test) or a PC analyzer. It is a code that displays the motherboard BIOS self-test procedure. When combined with the meaning of the POST code in the manual, you can quickly know where the computer is malfunctioning. Especially when the PC cannot boot the operating system, the black screen, and the buzzer is not called, it is more convenient to use this card, so that you can do more with less! Therefore, almost everyone who installs and repairs computers must have this card. Specifications: System: for Windows 98 SE/ ME/ NT/ 2000/ XP / VISTA Size: Approx. 63cm x 47cm(L*W) Support for desktop computers With the world's only motherboard operating indicator; The use of patch components does not hurt hands; The content of the manual has been updated, and Chinese or English can be selected; This card can be inserted into ISA or PCI; Plug in the wrong slot or reverse insertion will not burn any parts; Able to display the crash of repeated automatic reset under a black screen; You can diagnose the failures in the board without plugging in the CPU and other empty boards. Suitable for all computers with PCI or ISA interface. Installation guide: Insert the diagnostic card into the PCI or ISA slot of the computer motherboard. According to the digital code displayed on the diagnostic card after turning on the power, you can check the meaning of the code in the "Instruction Manual" delivered, and you can know what part of the hardware is faulty. From now on, you don't need to replace the monitor and graphics card The faulty components can be determined by successive generations of memory, memory, and CPU. Package contains: 1. Diagnostic test card; 2. Instruction manual;

name: Laptop Computer DDR4 RAM Tester Module Stick and Motherboard DDR4 Memory Slot Complete Set Diagnostic Analyzer Post Card Solution Kit 260 Pin All Speed Voltage
short_description: 【1】Ever seen the laptop computer powers ON but no display screen with beep sounds? Laptop freezes or BSOD blue screen during uses? We may start troubleshooting it from checking on the memory RAM components.

【2】Now we have this Great affordable laptop DDR4 tool kit to check on the laptop RAM parts quickly and easily. New technologies make the laptop troubleshooting DIY much easier. This is the laptop DDR4 Memory RAM check solution test kit, please make sure the laptop comes with the DDR4 memory (not DDR3 or DDR5).

【3】The laptop memory pins and circuit paths will be checked by this hardware RAM tester kit, the diagnostic results will be indicated by the bright LEDs on the each tester card quickly, no need to run the time consuming RAM diagnosis software bit by bit, saves time and labor, no need to power on the laptop computer to do the diagnosis.

【4】Multi-layers high quality PCB materials made, professional and precisely designed, crafted, sturdy and durable. Nice light weight for OTG onsite laptop quick troubleshooting and helping friends or colleagues’ laptops. This upgraded edition uses the Type C power source to assure the stable power voltage to get the best LED performance and diagnostic results. Both type C USB power cable and the antistatic strap are included.

【5】Life time supports! Great and Essential for Laptop Computer Owners and Computer Technicians to help saving a lot time in the laptop RAM hardware troubleshooting and repairs. Get this easy to use yet professional tools to help our laptop repair needs today.
product_description: Our laptop computers could have gone faulty and not showing any POST display, blue screens of death or freezes problem. These problems could be caused by the system memory components that consists of system RAM modules and/or the motherboard RAM slots. Checking the system memory RAM module sticks is the easy startup step that we can try. But if still not able to get the laptop to show the POST display, we will need to check on the motherboard RAM slots as well. The broken/ shorted / open-circuited RAM slots could also cause the problem. In order to get these laptop computer memory issues quick troubleshooter, we need the nice right set of the hardware test kit to help us out. Here is one of the easiest and the best to use laptop computer DDR4 memory RAM tester card kit we need to quick check on the laptop computer DDR4 memory. Each laptop comes with the different memory RAM system, please kindly consult the laptop manual to make sure the laptop comes with the DDR4 memory and this DDR4 RAM module sticks are removable but not welded on the motherboard so we can pull the RAM module off the motherboard and install on this tester to check quickly. This new laptop DDR4 memory RAM solution tester kit consists of: 1. Laptop motherboard removable DDR4 RAM stick Module tester 1. Laptop motherboard DDR4 RAM Slot tester 1. Antistatic wrist strap RAM module not included (for demo only). Must have for the Laptop owners, office / internet shop computer admins, computer technicians, laptop traders, the computer class students and school lab admins …etc. Make laptop quick hardware troubleshooting much easier. A nice set of the laptop computer RAM hardware diagnostic doctor kit we need to prepare in advanced for our laptops. Comes with Easy guide and tech supports. Please contact seller by Amazon Message for the query or help.
